sentences.en: ...a physician who specialized in the problems of alcoholism.
A family history of alcoholism significantly increases the risk that an individual will develop the disease.
sentences.cn: 有酒精中毒症家族史的人发作此病的危险会极大地增加.

sentences.en: A multimillionaire media magnate has shocked his employees with his candor by telling them all that he's putting his business affairs on hold to enter an alcoholism - counseling program.
sentences.cn: 一位身份数百万的媒体大亨,坦诚地告诉他全体员工他将暂时搁置他的事业以便参加戒酒班,令员工大为惊愕.

sentences.en: Alcoholism is a disease that really obsessive people often get.
sentences.cn: 酒瘾是一种疾病,真正偏执的人才会得的.

sentences.en: Alcoholism often leads to the alienation of family and friends.
sentences.cn: 酗酒常常导致家庭和朋友间的疏远.
饮酒过度会引起酒精中毒.

sentences.en: His hands were trembling slightly with the first beginnings of alcoholism.
sentences.cn: 他的手有点发颤,这是酗酒的初步征兆.

sentences.en: Individuals in certain occupations are apparently more vulnerable to alcoholism.
sentences.cn: 从事某些职业的个人显然易患酒精中毒症.

sentences.en: She has gone through hell putting up with her husband's alcoholism.
sentences.cn: 她似乎?有勇气告诉男友与她分开.

sentences.en: The doctor wrote a treatise on alcoholism.
sentences.cn: 那位医生写了一篇关于酗酒问题的论文.

sentences.en: The doctors correlated alcoholism with severe brain disease.
sentences.cn: 医生们认为酗酒同严重的脑病有关系.

sentences.en: The problem of alcoholism was, and still is, often underplayed.
sentences.cn: 酗酒问题在过去常常被忽视，现在依然如此。

sentences.en: The research appears in the journal Alcoholism: Clinical and Experimental Research.
sentences.cn: 这一研究发表在《酒精中毒: 临床与实验研究》杂志.

sentences.en: There are many causes for acute gastritis: alcoholism, drugs, infections, etc.
sentences.cn: 急性胃炎的原因很多有: 酒精中毒, 药物, 感染, 等.

sentences.en: These findings suggest that there is a genetic component to alcoholism.
sentences.cn: 这些研究结果表明酒精中毒症是有遗传因素的.

sentences.en: To observe the effect of Actovegin in adjuvant treatment of acute alcoholism.
sentences.cn: 目的:观察爱维治在辅助治疗急性酒精中毒中的疗效.
